name: Full Stack Engineer
description:
WHO WE ARE

BAMBINIFASHION.COM is a digital children's clothing and lifestyle destination with our headquarters located in beautiful Vienna/Austria. Shipping happiness worldwide, it is the place where the most prestigious brands, the coolest and most up-to-date collections by designers from around the world, as well as sustainable fashion offerings for your little ones blend seamlessly with the most outstanding and personalized service.

We are a company with an entrepreneurial spirit and innovative culture, and the e-commerce leader in the children's fashion space. Our office is located in Vienna's tech hub, and our open space is ideal for collaborative work.

JOB OVERVIEW

We are looking for a Full Stack Laravel / Backend Developer. In this position, you are expected to be comfortable with both front and back end programming, and have substantial Laravel knowledge, as our main stack is Laravel + Vue.

WHAT WE EXPECT

  • Experience with Ecommerce architecture
  • Data presentation for analysis
  • Server setup / Docker
  • Suggestive systems/machine learning
  • Familiar with professional software concepts such as SOLID principles, clean code, separation of concerns, design patterns, etc
  • Experience with microservices.
  • Experience designing and consuming APIs.
  • Experience with automation (automated testing, unit tests, PHPUnit, PEST, etc.).
  • Performance problems and architectural challenges and basic understanding of fundamental design principles of a scalable application.
  • Be prepared to share one of your projects to present your skillset.

OUR STACK

Frontend: Vue.js, GraphQL, Webpack, TypeScript

Backend: PHP 8 (Lumen/Laravel), InertiaJS

Data Stores: Algolia, MySQL, Redis

Containers: Docker

CI/CD: BitBucket pipelines

Hosting: AWS (EC2, ECS, SQS, Redshift, Lambda, etc.)

WHAT WE OFFER

  • Full-time remote position;
  • Supportive environment where you will have ample space to grow and develop your role according to your talents;
  • Our diverse team of professionals speaks a dozen languages and will make sure you feel welcome and accepted from day one;
  • Competitive salary to be defined upon the interview and trial period results.
